twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 - #2
twitch_info.description: woooah this game is getting even cooler now

message.body: I'm currently making a level for atv game 13

Ascension to Valor is a new challenge that has been made for me by my friends featuring 100 different tasks in various games for me to complete, to spice things up theres a twist where I do not know what the games in the challenge are, I can only see the current game I am playing, and when I beat one, the next is revealed to me. https://shorturl.at/bdyQW
LETS GOO LAST TIS VIDEO TOMORROW
Max where is all my unpaid labour i have done to you for years
my bad, my money for the unpaid labour
craziest thing to me today was relearning how high the kid can jump today
why is it called crimson needle if it's any color but
"ah, so the Overwatch 2 stage is real"
i have two people on my steam friendslist who have played OW2 in the past 2 weeks
didn't that one iceberg have "cn3 reference in overwatch 2 files"
your The Race 1 video says otherwise
kai's that fucking nobody cares message lmao
in my game theories The Race 1 is a race of life
you are the creator, you could shater my entire reality rn with a simple sentence
this save has one very interesting setup jump
i think it'd be extremely funny if you were to remove everything made by not-Kale and you end up with only 2 screens and a half
(i am sure too but just imagine)
why look ahead when you can just not think
you gotta put that in next funny max clips moment vid
speedrunning 3d platformer-style game with a focus on speedrunning
really fun game, really cringy story (in a fun way lol)
hello max, i suck at needle
out of curiosity, do you have any plans on ever attempting k3 tomo and ouka?
tbh even though i suck at needle i find cn2.5 really fun
ye, most saves feel like "they make sense"
yeah this game is so fucking HUGE
I love my new gaming chair so much
theres 3 free buttcoin miners in there
k3 is like 300mb only with its insane amount of content
but k3 had ridiculously compressed audio. the version with better audio is like 1gb
fair enough, but then again, cn2.5 is almost twice as much
im still waiting for balloons to come out
did you collect all skins up to this point?
it was actually so well made to be able to do most screens upside down
this game has a few apples on 8px
doing well, finally back t1 fangames actually
nah I have more time and k3 motivation
lets hope maxinator comes back to speedrun 2.5
russel is dq for his car was 1.5 kg too light
have you tried eating some sugarcubes?
have you tried eating some sugar
yo is that my birth year in the game
yea i was born in LXV
why dont you do the downwards plane next to the blue apples?
once you've gotten the mail, they've served their purpose in life. you can get rid of them.
the fact that people genuinely CLICK in GD platformer levels
hollywood movies when the main characters goes to the middle east
it feels like someone used a paint eraser to make a path
like in hs, you still innit right
what is your hidden talent max?
you can make a paper cube
how long until we trace up the artist "this person is better than I am" tree until we find the One True Artist
late but wow 2 saves on this screen? how generous
even if its floor funny number, it actually looks cool
mastermaxify letting slip about the time chamber incident
that's how it's been 30 years since you last played needle, clearly
I'm insanely fucking out of the loop with it right now but it looks cool
do you think it'd be funny if people were expecting CN3 with this game but it's just a floor 100 so a lot of people are disappointed
the game is no longer funny
-1/10 sentence, to the void with you @stalkor
really wonder about the retcons with this game, CN2's lore credibility can't be taken as official anymore tbh
how how each gravity switch is more high-pitched
maybe you are right, i am definitely waiting for that hour long game theory video tho
arent you keyn on getting it?
someone in iwm chat just said that my atv level is very cool so there is CLEAR proof that it's not bad
whats the brown thing on the ceiling?
this might be my last message
also im just doing random stuff deafened
ok that is a cool gimmick
time to do that super diagonal
I think that's the bean bag someone was talking about last time
every fangamer should remember every fangame of the year
wannafest was pretty good for me but it has a lot of parts that were a bit boring to me
the final boss is really good though
so which number is humanly impossible
Well some of Colonel EX's attacks came from Inbachi mode
how crazy that some previous person has died on every single one of the spikes in this room
not one spike is blood free
yeah Meat Boy himself must've been through here
I wish you lots of fun mr mastermaxify
very nice. yeah dont wanna comment too much on this game. I hope it'll keep you interested in playing it tho :)
this whole screen has some really awkward jumps
holy shit that jump looks insane
u starting eva? I love that show :D
that consistency at the start tho
oh I see. thankfully its only one season and a movie. so not a huuuge commitment
you know how support is ending in a year?
have you ever heard of Embedded Windows or IoT Windows?
I run 10 IoT and the support is going to last until 2032
it is identical to Windows 10 Pro but there's no Cortana, no ads, etc.
I'd gladly hook you up with it
knowing someone at Microsoft has its perks
Windows 11 is actually better than 10 objectively
because you can press ctrl + left shift + alt + Windows key + L to open LinkedIn
but yeah I myself am gonna run IoT til 2032
and pray that Windows unfucks itself by then
if it doesn't then I will go to Linux
10 Pro and Home are missing certain features
and they have bloat and ads
when you are trying to make your ATM or toaster run Windows that gets in the way and hurts your product
so Windows makes an obscure version that is just no bs and supported way longer
I have always ran the versions from this series over the Home/Pro editions
as a consequence I don't need to think about Windows support for almost another decade
instead of this impending doom being months away
the word definitely needs to be spread about it, but I hope it doesn't get too big
because technically speaking this isn't what Microsoft wants it used for
but given that it uses HWID to activate there's nothing they can do once you have it
they are not going to fuck over tens of thousands of businesses who rely on them
over some nerds on the Internet
not over something like that, no chance
that would be an insanely bad business decision if they did that
like sure it'd be morally wrong to shit on a bunch of people for it
but even more so it would be financially wrong
Windows IoT and Embedded is not "buy it at the store" type stuff
extremely, they are only supposed to be for businesses and Microsoft employees
but there's people who leaked it and the cracks for it are open source
open source OS keygens is huge, that's never been a thing until recently
two decades+ of this shit and we finally have trustworthy tools
I have a legit key for mine though
it's a bit of an open secret
"if you know, you know" type deal
brb, definitely hit me up on Discord about it if you want it though
